name: Squat or Die
description:
This is the game created for First Startit Game Jam that took place in Novi Sad.

This game can be only played in multiplayer.

Press Space or Enter to play!

Play as the almighty Slavoljub (old school rich cowboy gopnik) or as Komsha (ex-spetsnaz combat bear who's seen some shit, maaan).

Game created by Bamboosters gang assembled just before the jam!

Stefan Stanic- 3d, animations, art, sound design

Mihajlo Ciric - Technical Director, Level Design, Unreal Specialist

Stefan Mijucic - Programmer
